instruction: Design a mobile app that provides parents with resources and tips to help their children succeed in school.
output: The mobile app will provide parents with the necessary information and resources to equip their children with the skills and habits necessary for success in school. It will provide access to fact sheets and articles on a wide range of topics related to education and parenting, such as time management, study tips, motivate kids to learn, communication tips and more. It will also provide a personalized dashboard where users can keep track of their child’s progress and access helpful resources such as educational videos. Parents will be able to set reminders for their children’s assignments, track their progress, and receive notifications when new resources become available.
